name: com.unity.xr.compositionlayers
description: Support for Provider based XR SDK Composition Layers.

samples.description:
Sample project that implements an external Android surface rendering to a composition layer using the XR_KHR_android_surface_swapchain extension. 

Currently, this sample can only be seen in the editor when using Unity's Built-in Render Pipline.
Sample showing how to use Composition Layers.

_upm.changelog:
### Deprecated
* Deprecated `EmulationLayerUniversalScriptableRendererPass.Execute`. This method depends on URP Compatibility Mode, which has been deprecated since Unity 6.0 and is removed in Unity 6.4.
